jd: From: Sam, Vyze1 inc slenka@vyzeinc.com Reply to: slenka@vyzeinc.com Job Description -If you find a lead java developer with project management experience coming for MedTech domain, We can try that. Its a time sensitive requirement. MedTech Experience: Candidates must have recent project experience (3-5+ years) working with and supporting MedTech clients. (Please check all the list of Med Tech Companies in USA) List of Med Tech Companies - USA:Medtronic, Johnson & Johnson (J&J) Medical Devices, Abbott Laboratories, Boston Scientific, Stryker Corporation, GE HealthCare, Zimmer Biomet, Danaher Corporation, 3M Health Care, Edwards Lifesciences, Thermo Fisher Scientific, Hologic, Baxter International, Siemens Healthiness USA, Becton, Dickinson and Company (BD), Intuitive Surgical, Philips Healthcare USA, Varian Medical Systems, Cardinal Health, Invacare Corporation., Henry Schein, Inc, Align Technology, Hill-Rom Holdings, Cerner Corporation, ResMed, Masimo Corporation, Alcon Laboratories, Insulet Corporation, NuVasive, Teleflex, Exact Sciences, Abiomed, Dexcom (continuous glucose monitors), Quidel Corporation, Penumbra, Natera, Bio-Rad Laboratories, AngioDynamics, iRhythm Technologies, Globus Medical, Invitae, NeuroPace, LivaNova, OraSure Technologies, West Pharmaceutical Services Technical Skills:Strong Java development expertiseProficiency with Azure and SQLExperience with Restful web services.Capable of handling Full-stack Java development teams Important Notes:Candidates must have recent, hands-on experience with MedTech clients to be considered. This is a critical requirement from the hiring manager and resumes without this will not be accepted.Please prioritize sourcing candidates who strictly meet these qualifications. need only local candidates Job Title: Technical Project ManagerLocation: Lexington, Boston, MA (Hybrid - 3 Days Onsite)Duration: 12+ MonthsRate: NegotiableJob Description:We are seeking a highly skilled Technical Project Manager with hands-on experience working with MedTech clients. The ideal candidate will have a strong technical background, experience managing MedTech and Healthcare projects, and deep expertise in Java development and Azure technologies.Key Responsibilities:Lead and manage projects for MedTech clients, ensuring successful delivery of solutions.Oversee Java Backend Services projects built on a Microservices architecture.Manage full-stack Java development teams, providing technical guidance as needed.Handle system integrations involving both devices and web applications.Work with SQL and NoSQL databases and leverage MS Azure for cloud-based solutions.Utilize Kubernetes orchestration and Terraform (preferred) for infrastructure management.Ensure compliance with MedTech regulations and standards, including HIPAA, FDA, and EUMDR.Apply your knowledge of FHIR and other healthcare-related protocols.Implement Agile methodologies and serve as Scrum Master for project teams.Collaborate effectively with multiple stakeholders, including business, technical, and client teams.Required Qualifications:Recent experience (3-5+ years) working with MedTech clients is mandatory.Strong proficiency in Java development, with experience in RESTful web services.Expertise in MS Azure and SQL.Hands-on experience with Kubernetes and Terraform (preferred).Deep understanding of MedTech regulations, including HIPAA, FDA, and EUMDR.5+ years of experience in Project Management.Experience in managing and delivering MedTech and Healthcare projects.Excellent communication and leadership skills, with strong team-handling experience.Proven experience working with Agile and Scrum methodologies, with past experience as a Scrum Master.Preferred Experience:Experience with MedTech companies such as Medtronic, Johnson & Johnson (J&J) Medical Devices, Abbott Laboratories, and others.Strong background in handling projects for companies in the Medical Technology sector.Important Notes:Candidates must have recent hands-on experience with MedTech clients to be considered.Only resumes meeting these qualifications will be accepted for this position.
